thread.title: Watch Robyn Hitchcock & Yo La Tengo Cover The Velvet Underground In NYC
thread.title_full: Watch Robyn Hitchcock & Yo La Tengo Cover The Velvet Underground In NYC

author: Peter Helman
title: Watch Robyn Hitchcock & Yo La Tengo Cover The Velvet Underground In NYC
text:
Peter Helman @_peterhelman | March 2, 2017 - 7:08 pm Share < br />this article: Instagram.com/poolmcd 
For the past two nights, former Soft Boys frontman Robyn Hitchcock has been performing his 1981 debut solo album Black Snake Dîamond Röle in its entirety backed by New Jersey indie greats Yo La Tengo. Following that, he’s been playing an entire second set, and on Tuesday night at Rough Trade NYC, that set included a cover of the Velvet Underground’s “Run Run Run.” Watch fan-shot footage of that and the rest of the show, plus yesterday’s show at the Bowery Ballroom, below. A post shared by Benjamin Han (@jouissancess_) on Feb 28, 2017 at 9:32pm PST A post shared by Brandon Futernick (@brandon.the.mandon) on Feb 28, 2017 at 9:09pm PST A post shared by Pedro Fernández (@pfernandezp) on Feb 28, 2017 at 9:52pm PST A post shared by erin weckerle (@eweck) on Mar 2, 2017 at 12:23am PST A post shared by Nichole Wright/Event Producer (@yourbonvivant) on Mar 2, 2017 at 8:09am PST A post shared by Tim (Tom) (@speedy1227) on Mar 2, 2017 at 9:30am PST A post shared by Gabrielle Fishman (@missgub) on Mar 1, 2017 at 9:03am PST A post shared by Benjamin Han (@jouissancess_) on Feb 28, 2017 at 9:21pm PST
